name: Cyber_Gladiator (Pre-alpha)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

MOVEMENT:

  • WASD - Movement
  • SHIFT - Dash

WEAPON:

  • LEFT CLICK - Shoot
  • R - Reload
  • SPACE - Pick Weapon
  • MOUSE WHEEL - Switch Weapons

DEBUG:

  • ENTER - Restart level
  • ESC - Pause
DESCRIPTION

Info about the project: https://www.patreon.com/projectcybergladiator

CREDITS
  • Game & Promotional Art - Gordica (https://gordica2.wixsite.com/gordica)
